00002 #include "mpi.h"
00003 #include "petsc.h"
00004 #include "sys.h"
00005 #include "parUtils.h"
00006 #include "octUtils.h"
00007 #include "TreeNode.h"
00008 #include "externVars.h"
00009 #include "dendro.h"
00010 
00011 //Don't want time to be synchronized. Need to check load imbalance.
00012 #ifdef MPI_WTIME_IS_GLOBAL
00013 #undef MPI_WTIME_IS_GLOBAL
00014 #endif
00015 
00016 int main(int argc, char ** argv ) {     
00017   int size, rank;
00018   bool incCorner = 1; 
00019   bool rePart = 1;
00020   bool checkBailOut = 1; 
00021   unsigned int writeBOut = 0;
00022   unsigned int rippleType = 2;
00023   char Kstr[20];
00024   char inpFileName[50],n2oOut[50],balOut[50];
00025 
00026   PetscInitialize(&argc,&argv,"options",NULL);
00027   ot::RegisterEvents();
00028 
00029 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00030   int stages[1];
00031   PetscLogStageRegister(&stages[0],"Bal");
00032 #endif
00033 
00034   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD,&size);
00035   MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD,&rank);
00036   if(argc < 2) {
00037     std::cerr << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " inpfile writeBOut[0]"<<
00038       " incCorner[1] checkBailOut[1] rePart[1] rippleType[2] "  << std::endl;
00039     return -1;
00040   }
00041   if(argc > 2) {
00042     writeBOut = atoi(argv[2]);
00043   }
00044   if(argc > 3) { incCorner = (bool)(atoi(argv[3]));}
00045   if(argc > 4) { checkBailOut = (bool)(atoi(argv[4]));}
00046   if(argc > 5) { rePart = (bool)(atoi(argv[5]));}
00047   if(argc > 6) { rippleType = atoi(argv[6]);}
00048 
00049   strcpy(inpFileName, argv[1]);
00050   strcpy(balOut,inpFileName);
00051   ot::int2str(rank,Kstr);
00052   strcat(balOut,Kstr);
00053   strcat(balOut,"_\0");
00054   ot::int2str(size,Kstr);
00055   strcat(balOut,Kstr);
00056   strcpy(n2oOut,balOut);
00057   strcat(balOut,"_Bal.ot\0");
00058   strcat(n2oOut,".ot\0");
00059   std::vector<ot::TreeNode> nodes;
00060   std::vector<ot::TreeNode> linOct;
00061 
00062   ot::readNodesFromFile(n2oOut,nodes);
00063   unsigned int dim = nodes[0].getDim();
00064   unsigned int maxDepth = nodes[0].getMaxDepth();
00065   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00066 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00067   PetscLogStagePush(stages[0]);
00068 #endif
00069   ot::completeOctree(nodes,linOct,dim,maxDepth,false, false, false, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00070   if(rippleType == 1) {
00071     if(!rank) {
00072       std::cout<<"Type 1 ripple."<<std::endl;
00073     }
00074     ot::parallelRippleType1(linOct,incCorner,checkBailOut,rePart,dim, maxDepth, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00075   }else if(rippleType == 2) {
00076     if(!rank) {
00077       std::cout<<"Type 2 ripple."<<std::endl;
00078     }
00079     ot::parallelRippleType2(linOct,incCorner,checkBailOut,rePart,dim, maxDepth, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00080   }else {
00081     if(!rank) {
00082       std::cout<<"Type 3 ripple."<<std::endl;
00083     }
00084     ot::parallelRippleType3(linOct,incCorner,checkBailOut,rePart,dim, maxDepth, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00085   }
00086 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00087   PetscLogStagePop();
00088 #endif
00089 
00090   DendroIntL locOutSize = linOct.size();
00091   DendroIntL globOutSize;
00092 
00093   par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&locOutSize, &globOutSize, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00094 
00095   if(!rank) {
00096           std::cout<<"Final Balanced Octree Size: "<<globOutSize<<std::endl;
00097   }
00098 
00099 
00100   if(writeBOut) { 
00101     ot::writeNodesToFile(balOut,linOct);
00102   }
00103 
00104   PetscFinalize();
00105 
00106 }
